metadata.name: Peacock
metadata.description:
It lives peacefully near the **Bergsons** house. It loves to hang around whenever **Mary** the Mother and **Hope** the new born child are in the garden.

Format: MP4
Original Resolution: 230 x 230
Video Resolution: 2070 x 2070
size: 7.14 MB

Animation: @Arwen.G
Character Design, Background: @Sol.Z
